descriptionHtml:
As a mage i hate manual labor & mining just really annoys me. If this was SWTOR i would tell my companion to do it, but since u cant i made this mod to make mining faster & not have to carry around a heavy pickaxe all the time.

---DESCRIPTION---
This mod adds an alteration spell to the game called Extract Ore that can be used to mine ore. To use it just point & shoot at ore veins to start mining. You can buy the spell tome from adept alteration spell sellers i.e Tolfdir or u can find the spell tome in Halted Stream Camp next Transmute spell tome.

This mod was inspired by Mining Flames by Vonwarr.

A great mod to use with this is Mining Extended by NiMayne aka Donald Love

---COMPATIBILITY---
This mod is incompatible with bound pickaxe mods such as midas magic & also incompatible with Mining Flames.

---INSTALL---
Use NMM or place .esp into Data directory.

---UNISTALL---
Use NMM or remove .esp from Data directory.
author: Savage Hammer
